filter-guidelines.guideline: Block only when the violation is clear and substantial, not for incidental mentions or educational/informative contextualization of sensitive topics.
Analytical discussions on ethical topics, moral dilemmas, or case studies must not be blocked if the tone is neutral and the purpose is educational.
In case of significant doubt, proceed with blocking and defer detailed analysis to semantic search on the original documents.

UNI Charter of Ethics for People (2020), Code of Ethics and Conduct Rules (2024), Universal Declaration of Human Rights, EU Charter of Fundamental Rights, UNI ISO 26000, UN Global Compact, Agenda 2030.
